title: Rapid synthesis of MXenes and their potential risk to bacterial communities in the tomato rhizosphere
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00827D, Communication
Yuchen Liu, Houpu Zhang, Jie Ren, Chao Zhang, Mao Xu, Dan Liu, Yuru Wang, Weiwei Lei, Xiaoli Zhao, Cheng Chen
A rapid MXene preparation method has been developed, and the negligible impact of MXene on the soil environment has been confirmed through the evaluation of the sensitive rhizosphere bacterial community.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
